tasks.title: Do your own task
tasks.description: If you want to build a ship, don't drum up people to collect wood and don't assign them tasks and work, but rather teach them to long for the endless immensity of the sea.

tasks.title: Noble task
tasks.description: I long to accomplish a great and noble task, but it is my chief duty to accomplish small tasks as if they were great and noble.
